title: Dynamic changes of platelets before and after surgery predict the prognosis of patients with aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Yunfan Zhou, Ke Wang, Runting Li, Fa Lin, Yu Chen, Jun Yang, Heze Han, Tu Li, Yitong Jia, Kexin Yuan, Haibin Zhang, Ruinan Li, Zhipeng Li, Cunyang Li, Yahui Zhao, Qiang Hao, Xiaolin Chen, Yuanli Zhao
